column12: First by-election poll in Britain. Put Labour ahead and within 1% for both parties

column13: There was an NOP poll but Tear and Spence, Political Opinion Polls, give the same figures for the poll and the result

column14: Note: polls for by-elections before this point are listed in alphabetic order of pollster rather than fieldwork dates

column16: Figures appear not to exclude Don't Knows etc.

column3: (ICM poll before list of candidates known)
